name: lodestone
tagline: A self-hosted platform for building connected knowledge bases
description: Lodestone is an adaptive knowledge management platform designed to organize and connect concepts, documents, and relationships. It supports visual linking, collaborative knowledge graphs, and self-hosted knowledge bases.

features.title: Knowledge Management
features.description: Visual linking, Concept organization, Relationship mapping. Build connected knowledge bases

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multi-user, Shared knowledge, Team workspaces. Build knowledge together

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Privacy-focused, Custom deployment, Full control. Own your knowledge infrastructure

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Attach files, Embed content, Rich media. Comprehensive knowledge capture

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Full-text search, Graph exploration, Related concepts. Find information quickly

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track changes, Restore versions, Audit trail. Never lose knowledge
